name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Delicious and chewy classic chocolate chip cookies.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups semisweet and/or milk chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the flour and baking soda; set aside.
In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, cream the butter and sugars on medium speed until light and fluffy.
Add salt, vanilla, and eggs, and mix until combined.
Gradually add the flour mixture, mixing just until combined.
Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto baking sheets lined with parchment paper.
Bake until cookies are golden brown, about 10-12 minutes.
Let them cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
